description: Proficient in JavaScript and focus on mobile web development; self-motivated in FE domain knowledge; Strong domain knowledge in CI/CD release process.
Experienced in A/B testing and good understanding of metrics analysis with practical engineering implement process; Strong understanding of ad monetization in the engineering domain.
Expertise in search FE application development and FE performance tuning; Led Yahoo Search FE projects with less abandonment rate and better UX.
Good communication skills in engineering technical stack and project management.

High profiles of hackathon winner in the world-class competition (Second place of Yahoo Open Hack Day 2012 and 2013, The Most Potential Award of Yahoo Open Hack Day 2012; Second place of Mozilla Firefox OS App Day 2013); Proactive and creative hackathon player in the team with participation record (Facebook, Line, Booking.com, Baidu).
